pageContext.title: In brief: Line gives up control of its games business to raise $110m
pageContext.content:
Messaging app Line has sold the majority of Line Game to raise funds for the expansion of the unit’s collection of titles. Some of the capital will also be used to pursue global opportunities.

The external investor, Anchor Equity, provided US$110 million in financing via its subsidiary Lungo Entertainment, according to a disclosure from Line.

Source: TechCrunch

seo.title: In brief: Line's games business raises $110m
seo.description: The business has taken on capital from Anchor Equity to expand its titles and pursue global opportunities.
